channel.title: ZionScape 2016
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://forums.zionscape.net/images/bluefox/misc/Zionscape1.png[/img]
[B]Website[/B]: [URL=http://"www.zionscape.net"]ZionScape - We've Got It All[/URL] [B]Play Now[/B]: [URL=http://"http://zionscape.net/ways-to-play"]ZionScape - Webclient[/URL] [B]Highscores[/B]: [URL=http://"http://zionscape.net/hiscores"]ZionScape - Highscores[/URL] [B]Vote[/B]: [URL=http://"www.zionscape.net/vote"]ZionScape - Vote[/URL]
[B][U] Development Team [/U][/B] [IMG]https://www.rune-server.org/static/crown/prgrmr.png[/img]Developer - Stuart
[B] Overview [/B]
ZionScape offers a wide variety of choice and entertainment that provides a unique style of game-play for every single one of our players. We were a prosperous server back in our peak days - and now we've come to show our huge array of features bound to pull you in. We've spent a lot of time, money and effort into ensuring the best possible style of content that intrigues the interest of members of all types. Whether you're looking for a challenge in our uniquely designed bosses, a scare when you're out and about in the wilderness, or perhaps making a run for it in our custom designed zombie minigame - one of our many different minigames we offer here at ZionScape. Do you prefer to be one of the top players in the highscores by competing with others in the grinding of your skills, or would you rather be a well known player-killer. Whatever it is you're looking for, we provide bug-free flawless enjoyable content to suit your every desire simply because "We've Got It All".[/CENTER]
[size=12pt] I[b]gnore the brightness of the inventory and items in these pictures, I had a really high brightness set for personal preference, it is at the standard brightness upon login. [/b] [/size]
[B] Minigames [/B]
The minigames here in ZionScape are above and beyond. Instead of only telling you the names, let's take an in-depth analysis of [B][I]some[/I][/B] of both classic, and new minigames we offer.
[ul][*][B] Castle Wars: [/B] We absolutely knew we needed this one. Every single feature works. The catapult, ropes, barricades, wall scaling, doors, potions & underground. Who doesn't love a good ol' capture the flag? This minigame will definitely incline your participation to defeat the enemy team and capture the most flags. If you're not much of a flag go-getter, then you better pull out your weaponry and prepare for the battlefield!
[SPOILER=Castle Wars] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/watUJZJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CgLk6uZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NMn3LeJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LZV25q6.png[/img]][/SPOILER]
[*][B] Clan Wars: [/B] Our fully operational clan wars allows you to participate in war with enemy clans to see who is superior! With all 5 maps playable, and available options completely functional, it provides you with the full experience of everything a clan war should be. Along with both the white and red portal functional. This is useful for those clan warriors who sure love to spark up a fight.
[SPOILER=Clan Wars][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xZB8gnS.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/c2yWa8U.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G8bV0t9.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[*][B] Jad & Kiln: [/B] Classical full 63 wave Jad minigame, however we didn't stop there. We also include the Kiln minigame, for you people ready to risk a fire cape for an even newer, sharper, and stronger looking fire cape, the TokHaar-Kal-Xil!
[SPOILER=Jad & Kiln Minigame][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R5pULHa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IHfKwPw.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[*][B] Duel Arena: [/B] If you're looking to 'get rich or die tryin' then this will be one of your first stops. We provide a complete and fully functional duel arena system so that you can stake your heart away (or maybe just some gold!). Although if it's just some serious fun you're looking for, feel free to pop in for some friendly duels with a friend or random members.
[SPOILER=Duel Arena][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aBUDpYL.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eef073f.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[*][B] Pest Control: [/B] Classical pest control to take down the portals as you fend off monsters to protect the knight! With spawning shifters, spinners, defilers, and all the monsters this game has to offer, you have a task on you to earn points to spend on the void knight amour and other rewards.
[SPOILER=Pest Control][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/plyWUXD.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[*][B] Barrows: [/B] Classical barrows minigame, kill all 5 brothers, with fully functioning tunnels and graves. [*][B] Kulodion: [/B] Earn your magic armour rewards by competing in this fun minigame against Kulodion. [*][B] Warriors Guild: [/B] To earn your way up from a bronze defender to the mighty dragon defender, you must show your skill against the amour sets of your choice
[B]Custom Zombies:[/B]
Complete with custom maps & game-play, we did not go short on this. We wanted to provide a fun opportunity to get together a team or your clan (or if you're feeling lucky, head in on a solo mission) in the chance to blow some heads off! This pain-stakingly fun minigame will endlessly thrive on your needy desire for blood and gore and keep you interested. This is so well made we thought it best be placed under it's own heading.
[B]What does the Zombie minigame have to offer?[/B]
[list] [*][B] Custom Maps [/B]: We've designed our own custom maps that provide maximum enjoyment as waves of zombies come scattering around you. With our own custom lobby, two islands to be unlocked, and 3 different weapon stations to upgrade too, you'll have to check this one out! [*][B] Custom Gameplay [/B]: This game offers more than just killing zombies, you start off with 50 points and access to low level beginner mage, range, and melee gear. To gain points you must kill zombies to unlock the other weapon buildings. as well as the other half of the island. The game offers 3 different perks: Instant Kill, Double Points, and Restored, which are totally random. And on top of that, in the final weapon station, there is a chest where you can risk your points for the chance at a multitude of high level weapon or nothing at all! [*][B] Endless Fun [/B]: By this we mean, the waves will never end. You continue to keep on going until you just can't go no more. From starting with nothing, to working your up the riches in the zombie world. You can play this game either solo, with a clan, or with a random team. But don't think a team will make it any easier, the difficulty of the game all depends on the amount of players in the game.
[SPOILER=Zombies] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Sxd9GoY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yQALKxz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/izWxv0u.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QRD04g6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UGR21QA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HLzEAuN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tTgEkFu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QZD8fUD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NAYRgm4.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[B] Player Vs Monster [/B]
Here at ZionScape, we provide a plethora of monsters to hunt and loot to savage, either all for yourself or with a group. We have specifically designed them to be challenging - albeit not to challenging - such that you can enjoy many variations of game-play. From Nex to Nomad, and from Revenants to Glacors, we didn't stop short of what's available. Here's [I][B]some[/B][/I] of what we offer.
[list] [*]Nex [*]Nomad [*]Glacors [*]Jungle Demon [*]Full Revenant cave [*]All 4 God Wars dungeon bosses [*]Tormented Demons [*]Avatar of Destruction [*]Barrelchest [*]WildyWyrm [*]Giant Mole [*]King Black Dragon [*]Corporeal Beast [*]Sea Troll Queen [*]Dagannoth Kings [*]Kalphite Queen [*]Chaos Elemental
[SPOILER=Player Vs Monster] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qADcaJr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CB7ESxh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/d4Q7fvd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wJ29W9M.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/X0vVSVn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tAkq8mo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ld3kEj8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Pgm6LZv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Kc1e65A.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[B] Wilderness, Clans & Player Vs Player [/B]
We understand many key concepts to a successful server are ones that reach out to those who've come to really fight. We ensure active wilderness with many of our most hunted creatures lurking the depths of it. While this is one incentive way of introducing players into the wilderness, our clans are always raging war on one another which also promotes the growth and use of the wilderness.
[B][I]Some[/I] of the ways we introduce incentive to an active wilderness:[/B]
[list] [*][B] Forinthry Dungeon [/B]: We have the full Forinthry Dungeon with all added spawns, from Revenant imps and goblins, green dragons, hellhounds, to Revenant knights and dragons, and everything in between! Find access to this dungeon deep in the wilderness, and risk it all for extraordinary loot.
[SPOILER=Forinthry Dungeon][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wrZhNZa.png[/img]
[IMG]http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/7/7d/Forinthry_Dungeon_map.png/revision/latest?cb=20130909210230[/img][/SPOILER]
[*][B] Monsters lurking the depths [/B]: From Revenants to frost dragons - and still much more - we ensure that players who are seeking only the highest of treasures will have to take the biggest risks of all. So if you're looking for someone to kill, it's always safe to say you can check these areas. We have a multitude of high level monsters, and low level monsters in the wilderness to ensure an active wilderness, of not only pkers, but bossers and skillers. Here are [B][I]some [/I][/B]of the monsters you can find in the wilderness
[SPOILER=Wilderness Bosses] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/r9de02L.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qnJ3cfq.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[*][B] Wilderness Activity [/B]: We are trying to keep an active wilderness, not only by bosses, but skilling. We offer different type of skilling in the wilderness, from minning to slayer, aswell as agility, complete the wilderness agility course for a bonus in agility. We have loads of monsters throughout the wilderness, from bosses to slayer npcs. To encourage using slayer in the wild, killing slayer monsters in the wilderness will give you a bonus in xp vs killing them in safe zones.
[SPOILER=Wild activity][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2b0K06O.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GUHL1rW.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GY5z7g1.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[B] Skilling [/B]
Skilling is a large part of how we prosper our thriving community. Every available skill including summoning, is fully functional and completely working as it should, including proper maps such as the blood altar map, and alternate slayer maps. We've spent a large amount of time ensuring you will receive a superb experience where the rates aren't to high, nor to low. We wanted to make sure we created competition, and a rewarding feeling of accomplishment as you achieve something. With ore depletion, trees turning into stumps, runecrafting pouches, multiple agility courses, and everything else we are sure we have achieved this. [B] We dont feel the need to show a picture for every single skill, as you get the point. [/B]
[list] [*]Attack [*]Strength [*]Defence [*]Range [*]Prayer [*]Hitpoints [*]Runecrafting [*]Agility [*]Herblore [*]Thieving [*]Crafting [*]Fletching [*]Slayer [*]Minning [*]Smithing [*]Fishing [*]Woodcutting [*]Firemaking [*]Farming [*]Summoning
[SPOILER=Skilling] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wDSgNvS.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Zu2j2EN.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZBHakWg.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gxgABWL.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wPJzoPA.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yG9J7cu.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TbXfGv3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XDt0WD4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U20xRGO.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/219TtYZ.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[B] Quests, Achievements, & Clue Scrolls & Much More [/B]
Don't think we've forgotton about all those miscellaneous options for those explorers out there! We've taken the extra stride to provide full quests, endless amounts of achievements and to top it all off a full clue scroll system - with not a feature missing! We provide all the tiny details that others might forget about. We really wanted to take the time to get every key detail down, because we believe it's an important structure of even having all of these extra's.
[B]Just a few things we offer extra:[/B]
[list] [*][B] Quests [/B]: We've started off fresh with a couple [B]custom[/B] quests so far. Not Runescape quest remakes, real full length custom quests, that aren't beat within 2 minutes of returning an item to a npc. All of them follow an interactive story line with active dialogue, where the npcs are familiar with other npc names and races and interaction, join them on this journey and discover where it leads to!
[SPOILER=Quests][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qagMWOr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ziju6SR.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZtEUh6p.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[*][B] Achievements [/B]: We offer over 100 custom achievements, varying from easy to elite, you will never get bored with these tasks! Complete each task for points to redeem in a store! Complete them all as one of your requirements for the completionist cape!
[SPOILER=Achievements ][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fJkeUYz.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[*][B] Clue Scrolls [/B]: Complete fully functional clue scrolls, not a feature missing. Take your chances with easy, medium, or hard clues, obtainable from bossing, and see what kind of loot you can savage! We offer dozens of anagrams, coordinate, map, cryptic clues, and 4 puzzles.
[SPOILER=Clue Scrolls][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UTGavXm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GMEqQqp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eERJBRl.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[*][B] Full Clan Chat [/B]: This is a must have. Clans in general is one thing we prosper with, and we want to ensure we have every detail to complete clans. As such, we provide fully working clan chat, with ranking, banning, unbanning, and the rest of it.
[SPOILER=Clan Chat][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zlzmSUz.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[*][B] Loyalty Titles [/B]: All sorts of different titles to earn as you play the game, earn achievements & complete tasks. With almost 50 different titles targeting skillers, pkers, bossers, and everything in between, you will sure be kept busy trying to unlock all of these!
[SPOILER=Loyalty titles][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U6yojDc.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[*][B] Extra Weapons & Spells [/B]: From a fully working cannon to storm of armadyl, to all surge spells and an abyssal vine whip - and it doesn't stop there. We mean it when we said we let no detail slide. We want to make sure you have the best possible time here, and in order to do that you need lots of content, and that content has to work to the fullest!
[SPOILER=Extras][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HJKqgCW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Cx8FdQs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gTh3YvN.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[*][B] Bank Tabs & Searching [/B]: Easily organize and reorganize your bank with the wonderful nature of tabbed banking. With all bank buttons working, such as deposit inventory, equipped, as well as searching. Easily navigate your bank with fully functional bank searching. Bank pins work as well.
[SPOILER=Bank Tabs][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Jdac5Sg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Sf21fDV.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[*][B] Quick Prayers [/B]: For both normal and curse prayers, it allows you to customize which prayers you'd like preset & then easily enable and disable them with the press of a button.
[SPOILER=Quick Prayers][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nire3DA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VFwa6wh.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[*][B] Slayer [/B]: The back bone for every server is Slayer, being one of the most popular skills, we knew we needed to do it justice. With dozens of different easy, medium, and hard tasks with a wide variety of monsters and locations, you will be sure to enjoy this skill. We have so many different spots to train with so many different monsters. You also are able to do duo slayer with a friend!
[*]Relleka [*]Slayer Tower [*]Chaos Tunnels [*]Pollnivneach Dungeon [*]Jadinko Lair [*]Asgarnia Ice Dungeon [*]Kuradel Dungeon [*]Brimhaven Dungeon [*]Karamanja Caves [*]Ancient Caverns [*]Tavelry Dungeon
[SPOILER=Slayer] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fyPXVLe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OfEvdUH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OLuaZos.png[/img] [IMG]http://[/img] [/SPOILER]
[B] Client Functionality [/B]
Although the gameplay has to be well made, we didn't go easy on client work. Without a fast performing and eye appealing client, the game play cant reach its full potential. We wanted to let you personalize your client as much as possible to suit your style of gameplay! We went above and beyond to ensure you have complete control over how you want your client to look. From minimum, to medium to maximum detail, full screen, re sizable screen, player shadows, fog sky, mouse hovers, a wide range of hitmarks, and all sorts of additional settings to choose from. I'll let the pictures do the talking here.
[SPOILER=Client] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gOCh2Py.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/21wp9F6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WqKFTkN.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Icqkz1J.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4GLeRvb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yzo0wRu.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IJik1V4.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[CENTER] [B] What are you waiting for? Play now! [/B] [B]Website[/B]: [URL=http://"www.zionscape.net"]ZionScape - We've Got It All[/URL] [B]Play Now[/B]: [URL=http://"http://zionscape.net/ways-to-play"]ZionScape - Webclient[/URL] [B]Highscores[/B]: [URL=http://"http://zionscape.net/hiscores"]ZionScape - Highscores[/URL] [B]Vote[/B]: [URL=http://"www.zionscape.net/vote"]ZionScape - Vote[/URL][/CENTER][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/ul]

item.title: ZionScape 2016
item.dc:creator: @TylersPur3 TylersPur3
item.description:
@TylersPur3 wrote:

Ruby:

What made you bring Zionscape back, tyler? You guys have been gone for a while iirc

Just using the name again, its a fresh new server and a fresh new start

Read full topic

item.title: ZionScape 2016
item.dc:creator: @TylersPur3 TylersPur3
item.description:
@TylersPur3 wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:2, topic:554454”]I think you have a lot interesting content around the server, I’ll admit. I’ll come online and give it a shot. You are either with a lot of teams or own and quit a lot of servers. I swear you’ve advertised on Skype like 5-6 servers in the last six months lol’d.

Anyway, I’m definitely going to check it out.[/quote]

I haven’t ran a server in over 2 years. Tyler is a common name in rsps’s

Plus I have no idea who you are and don’t think I even have you on skype? haha

Read full topic

Anyway, I’m definitely going to check it out.

item.title: ZionScape 2016
item.dc:creator: @TylersPur3 TylersPur3
item.description:
@TylersPur3 wrote:

[CENTER]

Website: ZionScape - We’ve Got It All
Play Now: ZionScape - Webclient
Highscores: ZionScape - Highscores
Vote: ZionScape - Vote

Development Team
Developer - Stuart

Overview

ZionScape offers a wide variety of choice and entertainment that provides a unique style of game-play for every single one of our players. We were a prosperous server back in our peak days - and now we’ve come to show our huge array of features bound to pull you in. We’ve spent a lot of time, money and effort into ensuring the best possible style of content that intrigues the interest of members of all types. Whether you’re looking for a challenge in our uniquely designed bosses, a scare when you’re out and about in the wilderness, or perhaps making a run for it in our custom designed zombie minigame - one of our many different minigames we offer here at ZionScape. Do you prefer to be one of the top players in the highscores by competing with others in the grinding of your skills, or would you rather be a well known player-killer. Whatever it is you’re looking for, we provide bug-free flawless enjoyable content to suit your every desire simply because “We’ve Got It All”.[/CENTER]

[size=12pt] Ignore the brightness of the inventory and items in these pictures, I had a really high brightness set for personal preference, it is at the standard brightness upon login.
[/size]

Minigames

The minigames here in ZionScape are above and beyond. Instead of only telling you the names, let’s take an in-depth analysis of some of both classic, and new minigames we offer.

[ul][*] Castle Wars: We absolutely knew we needed this one. Every single feature works. The catapult, ropes, barricades, wall scaling, doors, potions & underground. Who doesn’t love a good ol’ capture the flag? This minigame will definitely incline your participation to defeat the enemy team and capture the most flags. If you’re not much of a flag go-getter, then you better pull out your weaponry and prepare for the battlefield!

[SPOILER=Castle Wars]

watUJZJ.png765×503

CgLk6uZ.png765×504

NMn3LeJ.png765×503

LZV25q6.png765×1005
][/SPOILER]

[*] Clan Wars: Our fully operational clan wars allows you to participate in war with enemy clans to see who is superior! With all 5 maps playable, and available options completely functional, it provides you with the full experience of everything a clan war should be. Along with both the white and red portal functional. This is useful for those clan warriors who sure love to spark up a fight.

[SPOILER=Clan Wars]

xZB8gnS.png766×504

c2yWa8U.png762×499

G8bV0t9.png765×503
[/SPOILER]

[*] Jad & Kiln: Classical full 63 wave Jad minigame, however we didn’t stop there. We also include the Kiln minigame, for you people ready to risk a fire cape for an even newer, sharper, and stronger looking fire cape, the TokHaar-Kal-Xil!

[SPOILER=Jad & Kiln Minigame]

R5pULHa.png759×497

[/SPOILER]

[*] Duel Arena: If you’re looking to ‘get rich or die tryin’ then this will be one of your first stops. We provide a complete and fully functional duel arena system so that you can stake your heart away (or maybe just some gold!). Although if it’s just some serious fun you’re looking for, feel free to pop in for some friendly duels with a friend or random members.

[SPOILER=Duel Arena]

aBUDpYL.png759×497

eef073f.png765×503
[/SPOILER]

[*] Pest Control: Classical pest control to take down the portals as you fend off monsters to protect the knight! With spawning shifters, spinners, defilers, and all the monsters this game has to offer, you have a task on you to earn points to spend on the void knight amour and other rewards.

[SPOILER=Pest Control]

plyWUXD.png765×503
[/SPOILER]

[] Barrows: Classical barrows minigame, kill all 5 brothers, with fully functioning tunnels and graves.
[] Kulodion: Earn your magic armour rewards by competing in this fun minigame against Kulodion.
[*] Warriors Guild: To earn your way up from a bronze defender to the mighty dragon defender, you must show your skill against the amour sets of your choice

Custom Zombies:

Complete with custom maps & game-play, we did not go short on this. We wanted to provide a fun opportunity to get together a team or your clan (or if you’re feeling lucky, head in on a solo mission) in the chance to blow some heads off! This pain-stakingly fun minigame will endlessly thrive on your needy desire for blood and gore and keep you interested. This is so well made we thought it best be placed under it’s own heading.

What does the Zombie minigame have to offer?

[list]
[] Custom Maps : We’ve designed our own custom maps that provide maximum enjoyment as waves of zombies come scattering around you. With our own custom lobby, two islands to be unlocked, and 3 different weapon stations to upgrade too, you’ll have to check this one out!
[] Custom Gameplay : This game offers more than just killing zombies, you start off with 50 points and access to low level beginner mage, range, and melee gear. To gain points you must kill zombies to unlock the other weapon buildings. as well as the other half of the island. The game offers 3 different perks: Instant Kill, Double Points, and Restored, which are totally random. And on top of that, in the final weapon station, there is a chest where you can risk your points for the chance at a multitude of high level weapon or nothing at all!
[*] Endless Fun : By this we mean, the waves will never end. You continue to keep on going until you just can’t go no more. From starting with nothing, to working your up the riches in the zombie world. You can play this game either solo, with a clan, or with a random team. But don’t think a team will make it any easier, the difficulty of the game all depends on the amount of players in the game.

Player Vs Monster

Here at ZionScape, we provide a plethora of monsters to hunt and loot to savage, either all for yourself or with a group. We have specifically designed them to be challenging - albeit not to challenging - such that you can enjoy many variations of game-play. From Nex to Nomad, and from Revenants to Glacors, we didn’t stop short of what’s available. Here’s some of what we offer.

[list]
[]Nex
[]Nomad
[]Glacors
[]Jungle Demon
[]Full Revenant cave
[]All 4 God Wars dungeon bosses
[]Tormented Demons
[]Avatar of Destruction
[]Barrelchest
[]WildyWyrm
[]Giant Mole
[]King Black Dragon
[]Corporeal Beast
[]Sea Troll Queen
[]Dagannoth Kings
[]Kalphite Queen
[*]Chaos Elemental

[SPOILER=Player Vs Monster]

Wilderness, Clans & Player Vs Player

We understand many key concepts to a successful server are ones that reach out to those who’ve come to really fight. We ensure active wilderness with many of our most hunted creatures lurking the depths of it. While this is one incentive way of introducing players into the wilderness, our clans are always raging war on one another which also promotes the growth and use of the wilderness.

Some of the ways we introduce incentive to an active wilderness:

[list]
[*] Forinthry Dungeon : We have the full Forinthry Dungeon with all added spawns, from Revenant imps and goblins, green dragons, hellhounds, to Revenant knights and dragons, and everything in between! Find access to this dungeon deep in the wilderness, and risk it all for extraordinary loot.

[SPOILER=Forinthry Dungeon]

wrZhNZa.png765×503

latest?cb=20130909210230720×640
[/SPOILER]

[*] Monsters lurking the depths : From Revenants to frost dragons - and still much more - we ensure that players who are seeking only the highest of treasures will have to take the biggest risks of all. So if you’re looking for someone to kill, it’s always safe to say you can check these areas. We have a multitude of high level monsters, and low level monsters in the wilderness to ensure an active wilderness, of not only pkers, but bossers and skillers. Here are some of the monsters you can find in the wilderness

[SPOILER=Wilderness Bosses]

r9de02L.png765×503

qnJ3cfq.png765×503

[/SPOILER]

[*] Wilderness Activity : We are trying to keep an active wilderness, not only by bosses, but skilling. We offer different type of skilling in the wilderness, from minning to slayer, aswell as agility, complete the wilderness agility course for a bonus in agility. We have loads of monsters throughout the wilderness, from bosses to slayer npcs. To encourage using slayer in the wild, killing slayer monsters in the wilderness will give you a bonus in xp vs killing them in safe zones.

[SPOILER=Wild activity]

2b0K06O.png765×503

GUHL1rW.png765×503

GY5z7g1.png890×768
[/SPOILER]

Skilling

Skilling is a large part of how we prosper our thriving community. Every available skill including summoning, is fully functional and completely working as it should, including proper maps such as the blood altar map, and alternate slayer maps. We’ve spent a large amount of time ensuring you will receive a superb experience where the rates aren’t to high, nor to low. We wanted to make sure we created competition, and a rewarding feeling of accomplishment as you achieve something. With ore depletion, trees turning into stumps, runecrafting pouches, multiple agility courses, and everything else we are sure we have achieved this. We dont feel the need to show a picture for every single skill, as you get the point.

[list]
[]Attack
[]Strength
[]Defence
[]Range
[]Prayer
[]Hitpoints
[]Runecrafting
[]Agility
[]Herblore
[]Thieving
[]Crafting
[]Fletching
[]Slayer
[]Minning
[]Smithing
[]Fishing
[]Woodcutting
[]Firemaking
[]Farming
[]Summoning

Quests, Achievements, & Clue Scrolls & Much More

Don’t think we’ve forgotton about all those miscellaneous options for those explorers out there! We’ve taken the extra stride to provide full quests, endless amounts of achievements and to top it all off a full clue scroll system - with not a feature missing! We provide all the tiny details that others might forget about. We really wanted to take the time to get every key detail down, because we believe it’s an important structure of even having all of these extra’s.

Just a few things we offer extra:

[list]
[*] Quests : We’ve started off fresh with a couple custom quests so far. Not Runescape quest remakes, real full length custom quests, that aren’t beat within 2 minutes of returning an item to a npc. All of them follow an interactive story line with active dialogue, where the npcs are familiar with other npc names and races and interaction, join them on this journey and discover where it leads to!

[SPOILER=Quests]

qagMWOr.png765×503

Ziju6SR.png765×503

ZtEUh6p.png765×503
[/SPOILER]

[*] Achievements : We offer over 100 custom achievements, varying from easy to elite, you will never get bored with these tasks! Complete each task for points to redeem in a store! Complete them all as one of your requirements for the completionist cape!

[SPOILER=Achievements ][/SPOILER]

[*] Clue Scrolls : Complete fully functional clue scrolls, not a feature missing. Take your chances with easy, medium, or hard clues, obtainable from bossing, and see what kind of loot you can savage! We offer dozens of anagrams, coordinate, map, cryptic clues, and 4 puzzles.

[SPOILER=Clue Scrolls]

UTGavXm.png765×503

GMEqQqp.png765×503

eERJBRl.png765×503
[/SPOILER]

[*] Full Clan Chat : This is a must have. Clans in general is one thing we prosper with, and we want to ensure we have every detail to complete clans. As such, we provide fully working clan chat, with ranking, banning, unbanning, and the rest of it.

[SPOILER=Clan Chat]

zlzmSUz.png759×497
[/SPOILER]

[*] Loyalty Titles : All sorts of different titles to earn as you play the game, earn achievements & complete tasks. With almost 50 different titles targeting skillers, pkers, bossers, and everything in between, you will sure be kept busy trying to unlock all of these!

[SPOILER=Loyalty titles]

U6yojDc.png765×503
[/SPOILER]

[*] Extra Weapons & Spells : From a fully working cannon to storm of armadyl, to all surge spells and an abyssal vine whip - and it doesn’t stop there. We mean it when we said we let no detail slide. We want to make sure you have the best possible time here, and in order to do that you need lots of content, and that content has to work to the fullest!

[SPOILER=Extras]

HJKqgCW.png761×503

Cx8FdQs.png767×503

gTh3YvN.png765×503
[/SPOILER]

[*] Bank Tabs & Searching : Easily organize and reorganize your bank with the wonderful nature of tabbed banking. With all bank buttons working, such as deposit inventory, equipped, as well as searching. Easily navigate your bank with fully functional bank searching. Bank pins work as well.

[SPOILER=Bank Tabs]

Jdac5Sg.png759×497

Sf21fDV.png759×497
[/SPOILER]

[*] Quick Prayers : For both normal and curse prayers, it allows you to customize which prayers you’d like preset & then easily enable and disable them with the press of a button.

[SPOILER=Quick Prayers]
[/SPOILER]

[*] Slayer : The back bone for every server is Slayer, being one of the most popular skills, we knew we needed to do it justice. With dozens of different easy, medium, and hard tasks with a wide variety of monsters and locations, you will be sure to enjoy this skill. We have so many different spots to train with so many different monsters. You also are able to do duo slayer with a friend!

Client Functionality

Although the gameplay has to be well made, we didn’t go easy on client work. Without a fast performing and eye appealing client, the game play cant reach its full potential. We wanted to let you personalize your client as much as possible to suit your style of gameplay! We went above and beyond to ensure you have complete control over how you want your client to look. From minimum, to medium to maximum detail, full screen, re sizable screen, player shadows, fog sky, mouse hovers, a wide range of hitmarks, and all sorts of additional settings to choose from. I’ll let the pictures do the talking here.
